name: Squirronimo
description:
Squirronimo is an arcade tower up game where u play a squirrel seeking to conquer sky, space and beyond with his jetpack. Dodge the rodent ennemis, refill your fuel tank and go as high as you can ! 

Game Designers : 

https://healingstorm.itch.io/

https://erbakasrevnel.itch.io/

Game Artists : 

https://saniel.itch.io/

https://naga-gaetan-p.itch.io/
